skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.RestrainResourceProduction
skill.description: For an agent to move toward a resource node and restrain its production with a specified quantity. Once the resource node is reached, restraint start. If the resource node is localized in a non accessible urban block, agent stays outside the urban block and restrain the production anyway. Because produce resource for a node requires the presence of the agent, action can only be done on one resource node.

parameter.name: resourceNode
parameter.description: The resource node to enact on.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quatity of resource that will be restrained to the node production.

link.name: reach
link.description: To enact the decision to "reach" a resource node.

link.name: restrainProduction
link.description: To enact the decision to "increase" the production of the issued node.

feedback.name: restraining
feedback.description: Sent once the agent is restraining the issued quantity of resource from the resource node production.
